# [Interview #940: AMOL Signing Report - Wetlander, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=940#10)

#### Wetlander

Have you started the embroidery yet?

#### Harriet McDougal

No (with a laugh).

#### Footnote

Harriet
[has mentioned previously](http://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=900#12)
that she purchased an embroidery kit in preparation for retirement, now that the Wheel of Time is complete.
